creditline: Gift of Elizabeth, Julie, and Catherine Andrus in memory of John and Marion Andrus
description: male figure wrapped in robes at center, holding staff with cross at top and image of lamb within oval; figure points an inscription with his PL hand on the unrolling, wind-blown scroll in his PR hand; stylized trees and boulders in background

title: St. John the Baptist
